text.title: Gas explosion flattens Mexico City maternity hospital
text.head: Gas explosion flattens Mexico City maternity hospital
Sources

list.item: Catherine E. Shoichet, Mariano Castillo, Rafael Romo. "3 arrested in connection with deadly Mexico hospital blast" — CNN , January 30, 2015
Lizbeth Diaz, Joanna Zuckerman Bernstein. "Babies found alive in rubble after truck blast rips through Mexico hospital" — Reuters , January 29, 2015
Katy Watson. "Mexico City gas truck explodes near maternity hospital" — BBC News Online , January 29, 2015
